unnormalised: Hey guys, return policies are crucial, right? Imagine buying a saree online from Jaipur for Deepavali and it doesn't fit! Hassle, ya? My cousin, Priya, faced something similar. She ordered electronics, but wanted to return it within 7 days. The seller in Delhi was quite understanding though. Like enjoying a plate of biryani, hassle-free returns make online shopping much tastier! What are your return experiences?
